DocAttribute.Name: Profiles
DocAttribute.Documentation: The profiles which are used to define the composite profile.

DocAttribute.Name: Label
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which the composition may be referred to. The actual meaning of the name has to be defined in the context of applications.

DocWhereRule.Name: InvariantProfileType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either all profiles are areas or all profiles are curves.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoRecursion
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A composite profile should not include another composite profile, i.e. no recursive definitions should be allowed.
